sub_title: Casinohost and Slot technician at Merkur Casino Almere
summary:
I would describe myself as an independent and pragmatic personality who finds transparency and open communication important values. I believe process-oriented work is essential to resolve malfunctions accurately and solidly. I find good internal and external communication an essential component to ensure that all gaming machines in the casinos are operational, so guests can freely enjoy their casino experience. 
I'm always looking for a challenge to expand my knowlegde about slot machines and casino's.
